name: Emily E. Davis WINN v. TRANS WORLD AIRLINES, INC., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Winn v. Trans World Airlines, Inc.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Emily E. Davis WINN v. TRANS WORLD AIRLINES, INC., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Reargument having been improvidently granted, appeal dismissed.
PAPADAKOS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James A. Mollica, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Wendell G. Freeland, John A. Meyer, Freeland and Kronz, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Michael L. Foreman, Pittsburgh, for amici curiae Pa. Human Relations Com’n.
Byrd R. Brown, Pittsburgh, for amici curiae Pittsburgh Com’n on Human Relations.
casebody.head_matter:
515 A.2d 303
Emily E. Davis WINN v. TRANS WORLD AIRLINES, INC., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Reargued Sept. 16, 1986.
Decided Oct. 1, 1986.
James A. Mollica, Jr., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Wendell G. Freeland, John A. Meyer, Freeland and Kronz, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Michael L. Foreman, Pittsburgh, for amici curiae Pa. Human Relations Com’n.
Byrd R. Brown, Pittsburgh, for amici curiae Pittsburgh Com’n on Human Relations.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
